name: CryptoFacts
0:
”Alexa, Open Crypto Facts”
”tell me a blockchain fact”
”tell me a cryptocurrency fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto facts
des:
This skill will randomly provide 1 of 25 different facts on Cryptocurrencies and Blockchain.

Users invoke by opening crypto facts and ask for a fact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
